about-me.title: Web Development
about-me.name: Yevhen Dibrovskyi
about-me.description-2: I'm a web developer, and my hobby has smoothly turned into my main job. I have been professionally engaged in web development for several years. My experience grows with each new project, and I am grateful to my clients for their not always standard ideas and requirements for project implementation üòâ.
about-me.description-3: Today, my skills and technology stack allow me to carry out the full development cycle of the most in-demand web resources. And if I'm offered a mega-challenging project, I'll still happily take it on! After all, I'm not afraid of difficulties, and I have experienced colleagues who are always ready to help.
about-me.description-4: Let's collaborate and create something new together!

home-page.title: Home page
home-page.meta-description: Professional turnkey website creation. Only up-to-date and verified technologies.

cooperation-page.title: Cooperation
cooperation-page.sub-title: Your project is our joint mission
cooperation-page.text-1: Are you looking for a web development specialist? Consider cooperating with me. Here I offer various forms of interaction to best meet your needs.
cooperation-page.text-3: If you have a one-off project or need a long-term partner without the need for daily office presence, I will consider your freelance proposals. I approach each project responsibly, taking into account your requirements.
cooperation-page.text-5: Open to full-time job offers. I value stability and the opportunity to deeply immerse in long-term projects.
cooperation-page.text-7: Looking for a web development partner? Ready to discuss collaboration terms, become part of your team and work purposefully towards results.
cooperation-page.text-8: What you get by cooperating with me:
cooperation-page.text-9: Responsibility and reliability: I strive for accuracy and deadline adherence, ensuring high quality of work. You can count on my full commitment to your project.
cooperation-page.text-10: Experience: Despite my relatively short experience, I possess a vast array of knowledge and skills, treating each project with utmost seriousness.
cooperation-page.text-11: Flexibility: Ready to accommodate your wishes and adapt to project requirements.
cooperation-page.text-12: Awaiting your proposals and open for discussion. Together we'll find the best solution for your project!

brief-page.title: Brief
brief-page.text-information:
A brief is a short description of your ideas, goals, preferences, and expectations for the project. The brief will help me better understand your vision and develop the most suitable and personalized plan for your project, ensuring that we achieve the desired outcome.

When filling out the brief, focus on the project and the desired outcome, and describe it in your own words - I will understand you!

Once you complete this brief, I will be able to assess the scope and complexity of the work, suggest a suitable development plan, and prepare a commercial proposal with indicative timelines and costs for the project.
brief-page.meta-title: Brief - Web development service order form
brief-page.meta-description: Fill out the Brief to create an effective solution

content.description_1: Welcome to EDWeb. This Privacy Policy describes how I collect and use personal data that you provide on my website: edweb.site.
content.description_2:
• Data provided by you: Personal data that you provide through our forms (such as a brief and contact form), including your name, email address, and message text.
  • Data collected automatically: We use cookies and Google Analytics to collect information about your interaction with our site, such as page visits and setting preferences.
content.sub_title_3: Your data is used for the following purposes:
content.description_3:
• Processing and responding to requests sent through forms.
  • Analyzing site usage to improve it.
  • Enhancing user experience on the site.
content.description_4: I do not share your personal data with third parties, except when required by law.
content.description_5: I take all necessary measures to protect collected data from unauthorized access.
content.description_6: You have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data. Please contact me at contact@edweb.site to do so.
content.description_7: I reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. All changes will be published on this page.
content.description_8: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact me at contact@edweb.site.

possibilities.web-development-description: Development of turnkey websites and applications. Choosing the optimal stack of web technologies for successful development and convenient future support. Teamwork.
possibilities.web-design-description: Designing the user web interface and logic for websites, web applications. Creating logos, banners, animating website elements.
possibilities.e-marketing-description: A set of activities aimed at increasing profit from the sale of goods or services. Market analysis, creation of advertising campaigns on the internet.
possibilities.seo-description: Internal and external optimization to improve website rankings in search engine results for specific user queries.
possibilities.site-availability-description: Development/adaptation of websites accessible to people with disabilities, in accordance with WCAG 2.1. I have extensive experience and certifications in this area.
possibilities.technical-support-description: Website maintenance and support. Updates, SSL certificate installation, layout adjustment, functionality, design, hosting, and much more.

cookies.title: The site uses cookies
cookies.text: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. Google Analytics is used to analyze site traffic. Language and theme settings are stored in your browser's local storage and do not affect your privacy. To ensure security on the site's contact forms, reCAPTCHA is used. For more detailed information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
